title: Help with matching fonts
content:
Hi to all

I'm using verdana for navigation menu as well as main body text. Now i need to create large font size name of the company which will go on the banner. Can anyone suggest font which will go nicely with verdana?

Many thanks,
author: meyson

comments.content: I think the best suitable font should be dependent on the page context. Can you have a try of some serif fonts given you can use bigger font, like Georgia and Garamond? If you dislike the serif font, how about the Helvetica?

<cite>create large font size name of the company which will go on the banner</cite>

That would be called wordmak, which is part of the logotype.
